description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任第十、十一届全国政协主席，第十六、十七届中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and the Chinese Communist Party, a former state-level leader. He served as the Chairman of the 10th and 11th National Committees of the CPPCC and was a member of the 16th and 17th Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的妻子，马来西亚归侨，曾任福建外贸局党委书记。在远华案争议期间，她曾接受凤凰卫视专访，否认与案件有任何关联。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's wife, a returned overseas Chinese from Malaysia, formerly served as the Party Secretary of the Fujian Foreign Trade Bureau. During the Yuanhua case controversy, she was interviewed by Phoenix Television, denying any connection to the case.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记。他曾与贾庆林在第一机械工业部系统内共事，并在远华案争议中公开支持贾庆林。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. He worked with Jia Qinglin in the system of the First Ministry of Machine Building and publicly supported Jia during the Yuanhua case controversy.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记。在贾庆林担任中共中央政治局常委期间，胡锦涛是中共中央总书记。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. During Jia Qinglin's tenure as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Hu Jintao was the General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国委员会，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。贾庆林曾任其主席。
description.en: The National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front. Jia Qinglin served as its chairman.

nodes.id: 中共中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。贾庆林曾是其第十六届和第十七届委员。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party. Jia Qinglin was a member of its 16th and 17th committees.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，贾庆林的前任全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jia Qinglin's predecessor as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，贾庆林的继任全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jia Qinglin's successor as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。贾庆林曾任其书记。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Beijing. Jia Qinglin served as its secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党福建省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党福建省委员会
en: Fujian Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省的领导机关。贾庆林曾任其书记。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Fujian Province. Jia Qinglin served as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1990年代的重大经济犯罪案件，核心人物为赖昌星。该案爆发时，贾庆林正在福建省任职，因此引发了关于他是否涉案的争议。
description.en: A major economic crime case that occurred in the 1990s, with Lai Changxing as the central figure. When the case broke out, Jia Qinglin was serving in Fujian Province, which sparked controversy over his potential involvement.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人，厦门远华特大走私案主犯。他曾声称与贾庆林有过来往。
description.en: Chinese businessman and the main culprit in the massive Xiamen Yuanhua smuggling case. He claimed to have had dealings with Jia Qinglin.

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的大学，贾庆林的母校。
description.en: A university located in Tianjin, Jia Qinglin's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府曾经存在的一个部门，贾庆林和江泽民等高级领导人早期均在此部门工作。
description.en: A former department of the PRC government where senior leaders such as Jia Qinglin and Jiang Zemin worked in their early careers.

description.zh-cn: 中国在20世纪60至70年代发生的政治运动。在此期间，贾庆林被下放到五七干校劳动。
description.en: A political movement in China during the 1960s and 1970s. During this period, Jia Qinglin was sent to a May Seventh Cadre School for labor.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，根据毛泽东《五七指示》建立的农场，用于对干部和知识分子进行“再教育”。贾庆林曾被下放到位于江西奉新的一机部五七干校劳动。
description.en: Farms established during the Cultural Revolution based on Mao Zedong's May Seventh Directive for the 're-education' of cadres and intellectuals. Jia Qinglin was sent to the May Seventh Cadre School of the First Ministry of Machine Building in Fengxin, Jiangxi for labor.

description.zh-cn: 涉及前北京市委书记陈希同的腐败案件，导致时任北京市长李其炎被调离，为贾庆林接任北京市长创造了机会。
description.en: A corruption case involving former Beijing Party Secretary Chen Xitong, which led to the transfer of then-Mayor Li Qiyan and created an opportunity for Jia Qinglin to become the mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，贾庆林的前任北京市市长。因涉及陈希同案而被调离。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jia Qinglin's predecessor as Mayor of Beijing. He was transferred due to his involvement in the Chen Xitong case.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于香港的华语电视台。曾专访贾庆林的妻子林幼芳，她在采访中否认了与远华案的关联。
description.en: A Chinese-language television network headquartered in Hong Kong. It conducted an exclusive interview with Jia Qinglin's wife, Lin Youfang, in which she denied any connection to the Yuanhua case.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人，万达集团的创始人。有报道称贾庆林家族持有其公司股份。
description.en: Chinese businessman and founder of Wanda Group. There are reports that Jia Qinglin's family holds shares in his company.

description.zh-cn: 由王健林创立的中国跨国集团。据报道，贾庆林家族持有其股份。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate founded by Wang Jianlin. Jia Qinglin's family reportedly holds shares in the group.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的女婿，北京昭德置业董事长。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's son-in-law, Chairman of Beijing Zhaode Real Estate.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的女儿，李伯潭的妻子，李紫丹的母亲。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's daughter, wife of Li Botan, and mother of Li Zidan.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的外孙女，毕业于斯坦福大学。曾因参加巴黎成人礼和涉及巴拿马文件泄漏事件而受到媒体关注。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's granddaughter, a graduate of Stanford University. She received media attention for participating in the Bal des débutantes in Paris and for her involvement in the Panama Papers leak.

description.zh-cn: 2016年发生的大规模机密文件泄露事件，揭示了全球权贵如何利用离岸公司进行避税等活动。贾庆林的外孙女李紫丹的名字出现在泄露文件中。
description.en: A massive leak of confidential documents in 2016 that revealed how global elites used offshore companies for activities such as tax avoidance. Jia Qinglin's granddaughter, Li Zidan, was named in the leaked documents.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的长子。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的兄弟。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's brother.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。据报道，在2013年一次会议上，他曾推醒在主席台上睡着的贾庆林。
description.en: Chinese politician. According to reports, he once woke up Jia Qinglin, who had fallen asleep on the rostrum during a meeting in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的最高地方行政机关。贾庆林曾任其市长。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Beijing, People's Republic of China. Jia Qinglin once served as its mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的最高地方行政机关。贾庆林曾任其省长。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China. Jia Qinglin once served as its governor.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林于1959年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Jia Qinglin joined the Chinese Communist Party in December 1959.

description.zh-cn: 1962年从河北工学院（现河北工业大学）电力系毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Electrical Engineering at Hebei Institute of Technology (now Hebei University of Technology) in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 大学毕业后被分配到第一机械工业部工作。
description.en: After graduating from university, he was assigned to work at the First Ministry of Machine Building.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，贾庆林被下放到“一机部”在江西奉新的五七干校劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Jia Qinglin was sent to the May Seventh Cadre School of the First Ministry of Machine Building in Fengxin, Jiangxi for labor.

relationships.target: 中国共产党福建省委员会
中国共产党北京市委员会
中共中央政治局常务委员会
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在贾庆林担任中共中央政治局常委期间，胡锦涛为中共中央总书记。
description.en: During Jia Qinglin's tenure as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

position.zh-cn: 中共福建省委书记、中共北京市委书记
position.en: Secretary of Fujian Provincial CPC Committee, Secretary of Beijing Municipal CPC Committee

description.zh-cn: 在贾庆林担任福建省委书记和北京市委书记期间，江泽民为中共中央总书记。
description.en: During Jia Qinglin's tenures as Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Committee and Beijing Municipal Committee, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在远华案争议期间，时任中共中央总书记江泽民曾公开表达对贾庆林的支持，并认为贾庆林能进入政治局完全是江泽民游说的结果。
description.en: During the Yuanhua case controversy, then-General Secretary Jiang Zemin publicly expressed support for Jia Qinglin. Analysts also believed Jia's elevation to the Politburo was entirely due to Jiang's lobbying.

description.zh-cn: 远华走私案引发了外界对贾庆林是否涉案的广泛质疑，对其声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: The Yuanhua smuggling case led to widespread external questioning of Jia Qinglin's potential involvement, negatively affecting his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 远华案主犯赖昌星声称贾庆林在福建任职时收受过他的礼物，这些言论使贾庆林卷入争议。
description.en: Lai Changxing, the main culprit of the Yuanhua case, claimed that Jia Qinglin had accepted gifts from him while serving in Fujian, drawing Jia into controversy.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民安排贾庆林的妻子林幼芳接受凤凰卫视专访，以澄清其与远华案的关系。
description.en: Jiang Zemin arranged for Jia Qinglin's wife, Lin Youfang, to be interviewed by Phoenix Television to clarify her connection to the Yuanhua case.

description.zh-cn: 时任北京市长李其炎因涉及陈希同案而被调离职务。
description.en: Then-Mayor of Beijing Li Qiyan was transferred from his post due to involvement in the Chen Xitong case.

description.zh-cn: 李其炎因陈希同案被调离，为贾庆林出任北京市长创造了机会。
description.en: Li Qiyan's transfer due to the Chen Xitong case created an opportunity for Jia Qinglin to become the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 贾庆林的外孙女李紫丹被发现在“巴拿马文件”中拥有离岸公司，引发争议。
description.en: Jia Qinglin's granddaughter, Li Zidan, was found to have offshore companies in the 'Panama Papers', sparking controversy.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体报道，贾庆林家族持有万达集团的股份，暗示双方存在财务联系。
description.en: According to media reports, Jia Qinglin's family holds shares in Wanda Group, suggesting a financial connection between them.

description.zh-cn: 在2013年全国人大闭幕式上，据报道，吴邦国曾推醒在主席台上睡着的贾庆林。
description.en: At the closing ceremony of the National People's Congress in 2013, Wu Bangguo reportedly nudged Jia Qinglin awake after he had fallen asleep on the rostrum.
